{{menutrail|Main menu|Options menu|Display options}} [[File:ScoreboardOptions.png|thumb|The display options menu in [[Heretic]].]] The '''scoreboard options''' menu allows to affect the content of the [[multiplayer]] [[scoreboard]]. Its [[MENUDEF]] name is {{c|ScoreboardOptions}} and it can be summoned with the {{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_scoreboard}}}} console command.
==Cooperative options== *'''{{LE|Enable scoreboard}}''' (Yes/No) :{{c|{{CVAR|R|sb_cooperative_enable}}}} :Determines whether the scoreboard can be shown in this mode or not. *'''{{LE|Header color}}''' ([[Print]] colors) :{{c|{{CVAR|R|sb_cooperative_headingcolor}}}} :Chooses the font color for the scoreboard heading in this game mode. *'''{{LE|Your player color}}''' ([[Print]] colors) :{{c|{{CVAR|R|sb_cooperative_yourplayercolor}}}} :Chooses your color in the scoreboard in this game mode. *'''{{LE|Other players' color}}''' ([[Print]] colors) :{{c|{{CVAR|R|sb_cooperative_otherplayercolor}}}} :Chooses the color of the other players in this game mode.
==Deathmatch options== *'''{{LE|Enable scoreboard}}''' (Yes/No) :{{c|{{CVAR|R|sb_deathmatch_enable}}}} :Determines whether the scoreboard can be shown in this mode or not. *'''{{LE|Header color}}''' ([[Print]] colors) :{{c|{{CVAR|R|sb_deathmatch_headingcolor}}}} :Chooses the font color for the scoreboard heading in this game mode. *'''{{LE|Your player color}}''' ([[Print]] colors) :{{c|{{CVAR|R|sb_deathmatch_yourplayercolor}}}} :Chooses your color in the scoreboard in this game mode. *'''{{LE|Other players' color}}''' ([[Print]] colors) :{{c|{{CVAR|R|sb_deathmatch_otherplayercolor}}}} :Chooses the color of the other players in this game mode.
==Team Deathmatch options== In this section, the player color options are not present since the players use their [[TEAMINFO|team]]'s color instead. *'''{{LE|Enable scoreboard}}''' (Yes/No) :{{c|{{CVAR|R|sb_teamdeathmatch_enable}}}} :Determines whether the scoreboard can be shown in this mode or not. *'''{{LE|Header color}}''' ([[Print]] colors) :{{c|{{CVAR|R|sb_teamdeathmatch_headingcolor}}}} :Chooses the font color for the scoreboard heading in this game mode.
